website_summaries.verdict: A quality starter set that really shines for its sturdy build.
pros: 14-piece set comes in an attractive tube package
Features a leak-proof shaker with weighted bottom
Entire set is substantial at over 3.25 lbs
cons: Bottle opener is a little large, while the muddler is on the short side

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer, Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: A complete and handsome Bar Kit for a great price. The products are high quality, the seller is attentive and engaged. I bought the 14 Piece Bar Kit for my partner (a professional bartender), and might buy myself the same kit. Everything arrived on-time, in great condition, exactly as described and depicted. The only aspect that could be improved, in my opinion, is not with the seller or product - but rather - more of a personal idiosyncrasy and preference: I prefer a graduated jigger with 1/4 oz gradations, but I happily bought the kit with the jigger pictured and I have no complaints about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the professional bartending kit to practice making drinks at home and I am very pleased with the quality, appearance, and price. All the pieces are matching and fit together perfectly. The shakers, jiggers, etc. are almost identical to what I see being used in the fancier restaurants in my city. I also received a email, with a pdf file containing 94 cocktail recipes after ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Beginning Bartender
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because we like to craft cocktails on our family vacations. It really does have everything you'd ever need inside a convenient and sturdy tubular container. We've used it many times and found everything easy to use and of high quality. As an added bonus, the company sends you a pdf file with cocktail recipes, which we're working our way through! I'd definitely buy another product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Velyrhorde

customer_reviews.title: High quality stainless steel bar set!
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package, it was immediately clear that this is a high quality bar set! Heavyweight stainless steel that is not only easy to use, but just as easy to clean. Loved the packaging... I wish the manufacturer had a wider range of products... We would buy them all!!!
customer_reviews.author: GavinK42

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: This would make a great gift for either an amateur or professional mixologist, but I admit I bought it for myself for personal use at home. It's Impressively beautiful and I'm looking forward to a shopping trip to the liquor store for all the ingredients I need! The recipe booklet is a nice bonus. It shipped promptly and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: While this set is not bad by any means. It is not built to take regular use. I used it one time for roughly 4 hours and one of the pourers fell apart as well as the fine mesh strainer handle came "un-welded" from the basket. The shakers are of great quality as well and it isn't a bad price, but it is not a 5 star product IMO... Update: The seller contacted me about my issues and is sending me the replacements no charge. Very good customer service. And I have increased my rating accordingly
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but Hawthorne strainer fits awkwardly
customer_reviews.text: This kit isn’t bad. Comes with most of the essentials. Not the best but definitely above average. Only problem is that the Hawthorne strainer is a bit too big for the tins. Doesn’t allow for the use of the gate from the strainer but I suppose pushing the strainer to fit tight makes the spring compress allowing for a somewhat strain like as if using the gate... but still would be nice to have that option to use the gate or not... I have a feeling the Hawthorne strainer is going to bend sooner or later if I have to keep forcing it to fit the tin.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert Chan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set overall and everything feels quality... except the bottle pourers
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because they were so close to perfection. I absolutely love every *other* piece of this set, but I'd much rather it come with 2-3 bottle pourers than 5 poor quality ones. They work, but the pieces of plastic are bent and aren't very flexible for different tops. If the material gets changed, then this would be a 5 star bar tending set! If you don't care about how the bottle pourers feel, then go for it. This is still one of the best sets on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Hayden H

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself as a college graduation gift and I couldn't be happier with it. High quality, attractive, and comes with some recipes. The company also reached out after the purchase to make sure I was pleased. I am.
customer_reviews.author: Strungul

customer_reviews.title: Great set for yourself or as a gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for my needs. Had just the right amount of accessories in the kit. All items seem to be of good quality. Very pleased with this purchase. I have used it several times since I received it and it has not disappointed. I have had no issues with leakage from the shakers, they seal very well. I would highly recommend this set for yourself or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: jeff c

customer_reviews.title: At Home Bartending
customer_reviews.text: This product is nicely packaged and is a complete set for you to be able to do bartending at home. Want to mix cocktails anytime? This is all you need to make them perfect each time at home.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great product, incredible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set. Great quality. Incredible customer service! One item arrived broken and I reached out to the company. The CEO emailed me back (on a weekend) and sent me two items to replace what was broken. Went above and beyond what was expected and created a loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I am over the moon happy with my purchase. At first I had a lil issue but the retailer was so professional. And explian everything to me, I don't have the words to express how happy I am. I have recommended it to my friends thank you thank you keep up the great service.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Top notch bar set
customer_reviews.text: Quality at your fingertips! After researching bar sets for quite a while, I finally decided on this one. I’m new to mixing drinks at home and didn’t want subpar equipment to deter me. The shaker doesn’t leak, and all pieces in the set surve their purpose well. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: wineAlot

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It does not even compare to the junk I got at W Mart. So nice and heavy. great product
customer_reviews.author: NYMTB

customer_reviews.title: Every home needs one
customer_reviews.text: This boxed set of bartending tools is a must have for every new home. It would make a great wedding or housewarming present.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new Boston shaker kit everything was in perfect condition when it arrived. I would recommend this product for anyone who is an inspiring bartender.
customer_reviews.author: jace Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This set of bartending supplies is excellent for me, someone just starting out; but im sure it would be good for people with all experience levels. All of the pieces are sleek and fit into an appealing container. On top if this, the company personally reaches out to you to ensure you are satisfied with the product, and even sent me a free 92 page cocktail recipe book for free.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Great for starting up a personal liquor cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for his birthday (it was a gift for both of us LoL) and it's great for us as we try to get a liquor cabinet going. Mixed up a mediocre long island ice tea, but the mediocrity comes from our proportions and not the tools. Tools work very well! The seller also sent a PDF full of cocktail recipes, so I need to go through those to see if they are actually good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking solid set
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my nephew for his birthday and he loves it. Very nice set and it came with online recipe booklet
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: This impressive set has it all!
customer_reviews.text: This set was perfect for me since I’m new to mixing cocktails. I had absolutely no equipment, but this set has it all! It is very high quality and comes beautifully packaged. The sturdy tube makes an excellent storage container. This set will be great to whip out for entertaining. It would be a great wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Order this set as a gift and they absolutely loved it very well made good useable accessories
customer_reviews.author: Gforce

customer_reviews.title: Great bar set!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and I love it already! It’s a great addition to my home bar. Everything you need to make excellent drinks. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who enjoys making drinks
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brown

customer_reviews.title: love the Boston Shaker
customer_reviews.text: Solid Boston shaker. No leaking or mess using the shaker. Have been enjoying mixing some of the drinks included in the PDF file sent via email. This has been especially fun while dealing with COVID-19 staying safer at home! The tools work well too. Only thing I would really like is a stand for the shaker and tools -- I am ready to buy that piece, if you get one.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa buyer

customer_reviews.title: All of the pieces are of good quality and seem able to hold up to his ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He absolutely loves it! All of the pieces are of good quality and seem able to hold up to his harsh handling. We are very pleased with this item. The only negative, if it can be called a negative, is getting all of the pieces back into the box after use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue254

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am a novice bartender and this was a great starter kit. Very durable and stain resistant. I never used the bottle opener and the ice thongs were not the best but they get the job done. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CMelchor

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller
customer_reviews.text: One of the cups had rust. Seller got back to me within an hour and is shipping replacement. Quick communication and fast resolution! Product itself is great. Heavy duty and included all the necessary tools
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bartender kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality set in every regard and shipping was prompt. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: KB in MN

customer_reviews.title: It's a great set.
customer_reviews.text: What was impressive was the fact it included a fine strainer for drinks. Try finding one in retail stores. Good quality set. The tube package while great for shipping is not meant to be repackaged.
customer_reviews.author: joseph satterthwaite

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set.  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Given as a gift. I've had a different set for many years (40?) and this set from NAU Zone is better/higher quality (e.g. thicker more substantial stainless).
customer_reviews.author: J White

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He absolutely loved it!!!!! He just started bartending and I thought it would be a great idea to buy him this kit. I read online that this is great for beginners and I totally agree. He made delicious drinks for Super Bowl. We are going to Cancun and he's bringing this set along with him. I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yonina

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in one package.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package of bar tools at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Rikster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent value for an inexpensive bar kit. The only thing I would change is making the shaker insulated. If you are making lots of cold drinks, your hands will ice over!
customer_reviews.author: emijon1

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality set. Bought for my sister she was not dissapointed. The company sent a great followup email and i appreciate the small things like that. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dalya84

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a novice to my home bar. I wanted to purchased something of good quality however and decided to give this a try. It came today and it exceeded all of my expectations. This is excellent durable quality and seems to convey good years of use ahead of it.
customer_reviews.author: ernie crumb

customer_reviews.title: Serving up drinks professionally
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the product so much, I bought a second set as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for. I also appreciate the advance email from the owner with his contact info in the event there were any problems (there were none). A few days later an e-book with additional cocktail recipes. Now that’s customer service! I will be sharing the link for this awesome set with friends. Thank you Nau Zone and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: C. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bar tending kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Everything you would ever need in one tube. Quality material and very sharp looking.
customer_reviews.author: Derric Eisold

customer_reviews.title: There is no stand to hold all the pieces in this set
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the items in this kit are fine but there is no stand or anything to keep all the pieces organized. Now I have strainers and stirrers and pourers strewn all about my bar area. Otherwise it is a fine purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Quality set
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but I am so satisfied with the quality of this set! More so, I’m highly impressed with the email from the seller thanking me for purchasing his product and insuring that the buyer is satisfied with the product. Very rare. If your looking for a bartender kit this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: virginia coelho

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat this quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality especially for the price. I did so much research on bar sets via video and personal reviews. I am telling you, you will not be disappointed with this. I was really surprised with how much I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Maselli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hardware!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely beautiful kit! Very well made. I recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Neice set,. mesure in 1 shot on one ...
customer_reviews.text: Neice set,.mesure in 1 shot on one side and 1.5 on the other, It should be stamped in such a way to make it easier to read
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for your money with this nice kit!
customer_reviews.author: Carla K.

customer_reviews.title: The cups rusted in the bottom after one wash.
customer_reviews.text: The two cups it comes with have small rust spots in the bottom of them. Looks like where there are put together. Washed once and they rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A. Holthe

customer_reviews.title: The materials are great and the set is a complete set
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for a bar that I wanted everything about this product is easy to use the gifting was beautiful now I can bartend in my own home for myself or company
customer_reviews.author: Lavon McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and has all the tools of the trade
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and has all the tools of the trade. Since I'm a bartender, I just wanted a quality product for the house and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: chris c sirignano

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great bar set. I have had shakers and jigs galore, but somehow this stuff just works way better. Have used them for several parties over the holidays and haven't seen any oxidation or tarnishing. the bottle spouts are the biggest plus. I've never used these before, but they really help with overpour and spilling issues. Great set, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: The Mortise Chisel

customer_reviews.title: Five star quality.
customer_reviews.text: Set arrived today. 2 days after placing order. This set is great, comes with everything you need and all feels like top quality material. The minute you shake a cocktail with the boston shaker you know you made the right decision. Overall I’m more than happy with my purchase. I left a picture with my cocktail made with this set. 🤙🏽
customer_reviews.author: Luis c.

customer_reviews.title: Great bartender kit
customer_reviews.text: This bartender kit is well made and has worked flawlessly. I am a person who is more about functionality than style, but this set looks amazing as well as doing everything that it’s designed to do. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Wally D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised! Great Packaging, already used everything last weekend! Definite buy.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Finishing is bad
customer_reviews.text: Finishing on product is terrible, had one of the tumblers on the inside with rust, reordered it, the other one the came in was also rusted and worse. Other materials things in the set were ok.
customer_reviews.author: Triet Luu

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my fiance and he absolutely loves it! He's been practicing making drinks for himself and friends! Definitely a great set at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I assumed getting a 14 pc bar set for $40 would be be reflected in the quality level. I was wrong! What a surprise to receive such nice set that both looks and feels like a professional set up.
customer_reviews.author: GLI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar set! Great quality and had everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline Zambas

customer_reviews.title: Great bar set and even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Hi quality bar tool kit. There was a minor defect in the small cup. The owner responded to my email immediately and promptly sent a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Ken A.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to start making 🍸
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter and she loved it and made us a couple of cocktails right way. She had everything she needed!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and has almost everything
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality stainless and has almost everything except for 1/2 oz and 3/4 oz jigger, which often come up in cocktails 'recipes' Having this set and a glass stirring beaker (as well as the previously mentioned jiggers) or measuring cup and you are set for any cocktail. The fine strainer is essential for a smooth cocktail like a daiquiri.
customer_reviews.author: j jensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for home bartenders, and even professional bartenders as well. The only important tool I'd say that's missing from this set is a lime squeezer. but it's a really good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal Peters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Home Bar
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bar set that I have used nearly daily. Very good quality products. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: IndiaHoosier

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: Best customer service I have ever experienced. Needed a new muddler because shipping probably cracked it. Had a new on with a partial refund(I didn’t ask for) right away. Beat product hands down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my husbands bar in his man cave! He absolutely loves it! The quality is great and definitely restaurant grade! He loves having these tools behind the bar, it’s more professional and has every tool to make any cocktail! They also sent us a list of cocktail recipes! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the bartender in everyone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this kit the perfect set for the novice bartender or the expert bartender. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Neatly packaged and came with an eBook!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the seller sent the eBook to my email shortly after I received the kit since I've never learned how to mix drinks before. So now I'm able to start somewhere! I haven't used the kit yet, but it definitely looks good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Gromeo10

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: Got this set a couple months back and have put it to great use. Awesome for cocktails of all kinds!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bar kit. My bartender friend recommended this and I’m in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam J

customer_reviews.title: Great home kit, would be good in a bar also
customer_reviews.text: As a sommelier I’m very fussy about what tools I use on the bar. I brought this kit to add to my home collection and as soon as I opened it I was blown away by the quality of the kit. Have a few overseas trips ahead, and the tube is a perfect size to fit in my suitcase so I can indulge in my hotel as practice. Small business done right 🙌
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi Somm

customer_reviews.title: The muddler is very heavy and could be dangerous. I was practicing flair and almost broke a toe
customer_reviews.text: Everything was a step above what they have at the bar I work at (casual dining) Great for anyone who wants to start or improve upon the art of In toxicology 😎
customer_reviews.author: James Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value for the price, solid shaker, seals nicely, great quality metal, everything does it’s job and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly enjoyable with a surprise addition
customer_reviews.text: The set itself was very slick, as shown in the photos. It was nicely packaged and given as a gift to my dad. the equipment is of great quality and fun to use. Vendor even sent over a 94 cocktail recipe book, just as an added bonus :)
customer_reviews.author: Yacov Gorovoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, nicely packaged and great for the beginner just getting started or the pro that just needs quality.

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was better than I expected! I wanted something simple and this was perfect. The only thing I'm not a big fan of is the jigger, maybe a bigger more clearly marked one would be better.

customer_reviews.title: One stop shop for home bartenders
customer_reviews.text: Love the service. And the communication. The packaging is awesome and the product feels very professional. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starter bartending kit!
customer_reviews.text: It has all I need to dive into learning how to make my own cocktails during this shelter-in-place. What a great product to start a new hobby!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent packaging
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy packaging! I bought 3 kits as gifts and everyone loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: It has all the necessary tools, and they’re high quality too!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, impressive package.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice kit, nice and elegant. Only bad thing is that the bar spoon is too big to go into a tall shot glass.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality! Came packaged in a gift friendly canister and everything was individually wrapped.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and he loves it. He recently got a job that includes bartending and loves to make drinks using his new bartender kit at home for family and friends.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely suggest and gift
customer_reviews.text: Very nice construction. Looks great on my bar. I had been holding out buying a set for awhile because many others didn't have all the pieces I wanted or too many pieces and for much more of a price. Will suggest this and gift.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and very good quality. I’m very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier! It is a quality set and I got exactly what I wanted for a fair price.

product_meta.title: Professional Bartender Kit (14-Piece) | Bartending Kit Includes Elegant Stainless Steel Weighted Bottom Cocktail Shakers with Premium Bar Tools and Bar Set Accesssories | Deluxe Gift Packaging
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY: NÄU Zone's cocktail shaker tools all have a real heft to them. This bar kit is made to impress while dripping of beauty, quality, and functionality. This is not the typical light weight budget cocktail mixing set you will find a dime a dozen online.

THE PERFECT GIFT: NÄU Zone's rugged and sleek gift packaging resembles the tube packaging of a fine bottle of liquor. This bar tool set will be appreciated by aspiring or experienced mixologists. An awesome gift for that person that has everything!

EVERYTHING YOU NEED: 14 essential restaurant grade stainless steel bar tools every mixologist needs at a surprisingly affordable price. This is an eye catching, highly functional bartending set - a great product at a great price.

CLASSIC: Beautiful large 28 oz Boston Shaker with 16 oz Cheater Cup with weighted bases. The drink shaker cups are very sturdy and fit perfectly with each other for leak proof drink mixing and the perfect pour.
OUR PROMISE: Satisfaction Guaranteed by NÄU Zone. If you're not thrilled, we want to hear about it, and we'll do everything possible to make it right.
